types:type.name: Inventory
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Inventory = {| inventory: Array<{| productCode: String, size: String, description: String, count: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"inventory\\\":[{\\\"productCode\\\":\\\"100\\\",\\\"size\\\":\\\"M\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"T-shirt with logo\\\",\\\"count\\\":\\\"100\\\"}]}"}

types:type.name: Customer
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Customer = {| customerId: String, name: String, email: String, address: String, neighborhood: String, city: String, stateOrProvince: String, postalCode: String, country: String, phone: String, title: String, company: String |} {"example": "{\\\"customerId\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Leonel\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"leoneldornelesporto@outlook.com\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"Visconde de Abaete 322\\\",\\\"neighborhood\\\":\\\"N\u00E3o?\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Pelotas\\\",\\\"stateOrProvince\\\":\\\"Rio Grande do Sul\\\",\\\"postalCode\\\":\\\"96075230\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"Brasil\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"53991056367\\\",\\\"title\\\":\\\"Programador\\\",\\\"company\\\":\\\"Compasso UOL\\\"}"}

types:type.name: TrackOrdeJson
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type TrackOrdeJson = {| orderId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, status: String, productCode: Number {"typeId": "int"}, size: String |} {"example": "{\\\"orderId\\\":1,\\\"status\\\":\\\"String\\\",\\\"productCode\\\":1,\\\"size\\\":\\\"String\\\"}"}
